LocaleResource.Name: Plugins.Description.SmartStore.NewsImporter
LocaleResource.Value: Allows to automatically import news from RSS feeds.

LocaleResource.Name: LicensingHint
LocaleResource.Value: Please note that this plugin is unlicensed and therefore no news will be imported. To buy a license for this plugin please visit the SmartStore Community Marketplace.

LocaleResource.Name: ConfigSaveNote
LocaleResource.Value: Settings successfully saved. Please restart the application if "Automatically import news" has been changed.

LocaleResource.Name: ImageEmbeddingTopLeftFloated
ImageEmbeddingAppend
UpdateNews.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to update already imported news.

LocaleResource.Name: TaskEnabled.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Check the box if you want the news to be automatically imported.

LocaleResource.Name: TaskExecuteEachMinutes.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specify a task period (in minutes) after which news should be automatically imported.

LocaleResource.Name: OldestNewsDays.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the maximum age of news in days. News that are older won't be imported.

LocaleResource.Name: DeleteOldNews.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to automatically delete old news.

LocaleResource.Name: Url.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the URL of a RSS feed from which data will be imported.

LocaleResource.Name: Url.Validate
LocaleResource.Value: Please enter a valid URL to a RSS feed. It musst begin with "http(s)" and must not begin with "feed".

LocaleResource.Name: Publish.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to automatically publish imported news.

LocaleResource.Name: AllowComments.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether imported news can be commented.

LocaleResource.Name: LanguageId.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the language of the imported news. If unspecified, the language is taken from the feed or the default language of the store is used.

LocaleResource.Name: ImageEmbeddingType.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies how to embed images in the full description of the imported news. Therefore the feed must export a so called enclosure.

LocaleResource.Name: AppendLink.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies to append a hyperlink to the full description of the imported news. It leads to the original message.

LocaleResource.Name: Filter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies whether to filter the feed items.

LocaleResource.Name: FilterValues.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies values for filtering the feed items.

LocaleResource.Name: TagNameFilter.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the XML tag name of values to be filtered.

LocaleResource.Name: TagNameShortDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the XML tag name of short description of the news. If unspecified, the RSS description of the feed is imported.

LocaleResource.Name: TagNameLongDescription.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the XML tag name of long description of the news. If unspecified, the RSS description of the feed is imported as long description.

LocaleResource.Name: TagNameMetaKeywords.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the XML tag name of meta keywords.

LocaleResource.Name: TitleToPlainText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Indicates whether to convert the title into plain text.

LocaleResource.Name: ShortDescriptionToPlainText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Indicates whether to convert the short description into plain text.

LocaleResource.Name: LongDescriptionToPlainText.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Indicates whether to convert the long description into plain text.
